entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early in the afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early in the evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023
